name: Temenos Catholic Worker
description: Temenos Catholic Worker is a non-profit ministry that provides support to homeless youth in the Polk Street neighborhood of San Francisco, providing pastoral care, food, socks, and sacramental ministry. They believe all need non-judgment in their lives, and they serve everyone. Temenos meets people where they are without regard to race, religion, or sexual orientation.
